nodes.goal: Isolate variable x on one side of the equation
nodes.plan: Subtract 2*x from both sides to get all x terms on one side.

nodes.goal: Simplify the equation after isolating x
nodes.plan: Combine like terms and solve for x by dividing both sides by the coefficient of x.

nodes.goal: Verify if the solution satisfies the original equation
nodes.plan: Substitute the found value of x back into the original equation and check if both sides are equal.
